title: Club's gone :(
body:
So it seems as if Riot solved the club issue but I'm not seeing mine and I own it. I can see other members of my club with their tag but mine doesn't show. Any insight on this would be great. Thank you!
 
P.S) I also submitted a ticket two days ago but no response (Ticket #23951557)

IGN: RawrItsDave
Club Name: The Finessers
Club Tag: FNRS!
Person to pass leadership to (as resolved by one of the Riot members): YoungFinest

Anybody also having the same issues?
Thank you in advance!

replies.body: We're still working on club issues since it was restored after some [downtime](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/nMisJPK8-clubs-outage-oct-2016).  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can help club owners individually with their issue as well as forward it to our club developers.  Has your requested player to pass leadership to been online over the last few days?  I confirmed that you're ticket has been received, and a specialist will help out asap!

I'm having the same issue.

Club: BE A HERO
Tag: HERO]
